content.p:
ยง 72-1003. Fees.
 All persons required to obtain a permit or approval or subject to
regulation under this title shall submit annually to the department a
fee in the amount to be determined for affected land as follows:
 1. four hundred dollars for minor projects; or
 2. seven hundred dollars for affected land of an acreage equal to or
less than five acres; or
 3. nine hundred dollars for affected land of an acreage greater than
five acres and equal to or less than ten acres; or
 4. fifteen hundred dollars for affected land of an acreage greater
than ten acres and equal to or less than twenty acres; or
 5. four thousand dollars for affected land of an acreage greater than
twenty acres and equal to or less than thirty acres; or
 6. eight thousand dollars for affected land of an acreage greater than
thirty acres.
